== Math Equations

Using standard latexmath:[\LaTeX] syntax:

[stem] 
++++
\sqrt{37} = \sqrt{\frac{73^2-1}{12^2}} \approx \frac{73}{12} (1 - \frac{1}{2\cdot73^2})
++++

Another one:

stem:[\sum_{i=0}^n i^2 = \frac{(n^2+n)(2n+1)}{6}]
